data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 121 believers in Ghor, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ghor, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Ghor.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Ghor who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 764,355, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Garwi, Kohistani people might believe through him.
Father, help your children in Ghor, Afghanistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Ghor, Afghanistan.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Ghor, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
